entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , La Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:16 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
